import React, {useState} from "react"; function FormInput(props){ function formSubmitHandler(event){ event.preventDefault() props.onSaveInputData(inputData) } function resetHandler(event){ setCurrentSaving('1000') setyearlyContribution('50') setExpectedReturn('3') setDuration('5') } function inputChangeHandler(input, value){ } return(

inputChangeHandler("current-savings", event.target.value)} value={currentSaving} type="number" id="current-savings" />

inputChangeHandler("yearly-contribution", event.target.value)} value={yearlyContribution} type="number" id="yearly-contribution" />

inputChangeHandler("expected-return", event.target.value)} value={expectedReturn} type="number" id="expected-return" />

inputChangeHandler("duration", event.target.value)} value={duration} type="number" id="duration" />

) } export default FormInput;
